items.content_html: node-csv-miniDB is a Node.js library designed to simplify CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations on CSV files. Utilizing the built-in fs module, this lightweight and efficient wrapper provides an intuitive interface for managing CSV data as a mini database.
items.title: Tunmiseoni/node-csv-miniDB: node-csv-miniDB is a Node.js library designed to simplify CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations on CSV files. Utilizing the built-in fs module, this lightweight and efficient wrapper provides an intuitive interface for managing CSV data as a mini database.
